body: Damm whats going on with the final scene a súper powerful touma fucking the three of them I love it

If you look really closely at everywhere this idiot put text, you'll see that the guy (0fficial, because he's being fucking edgy by putting a zero in his name instead of the letter o) used a beige brush to clean white bubbles. It's so fucking bad that you can even see it IN THE PREVIEW PICTURES! Also, this guy's scans are most likely not leveled and in RGB color, hence the beige discoloration that's pretty much everywhere. This guy's so fucking lazy that he can't be bothered to fully clean most of the bubbles, which by the way, is the easiest part of editing. You take a white brush and get rid of black text, and he fucked that up too!

I've seen plenty of horrible typesetting/editing on this website, but this one takes the fucking cake. Holy shit, I need to spray my eyes with Windex and scrub them with a Brillo pad to unsee what I just saw.
https://discord.gg/v9JJJmdn doing a nitro giveaway at 250 members and every 300 after that! We only have about 189 members right now so any support is greatly appreciated.

One of my favorite doujins!  This version has MUCH better image quality compared to the one posted in 2016.  But,
1) Font & Typesetting is bad.
2) Poor grammar sucks. 
3) 2016's translation captured each character's personality way better.
2016's translation + 2020's image quality = the definite version of this doujin at last!
Lol Kongou did that just to kiss Misaka
ISN'T SHE GOOD? NO. SHE IS GOOD.
